metadata.title: CVE-2024-38441 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Netatalk 3.2.0 has an off-by-one error and resultant heap-based bufferoverflow because of setting ibuf[len] to '\0' in FPMapName in afp_mapnamein etc/afpd/directory.c.

criterions.comment: netatalk package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
